Who is Noam Chomsky | American Linguist and philosopher | complete biography in Urdu | Real Channel
Avram Noam Chomsky is an American linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, historian, social critic, and political activist. Sometimes called "the father of modern linguistics", Chomsky is also a major figure in analytic philosophy and is one of the founders of the field of cognitive science. He is the voice of truth in today's world. in this video, we are going to tell you about his life and his works.
